title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2001 to 2003, roughly constant from 2003 to 2005, slightly increasing from 2005 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2010, slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2014, roughly increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, and lastly slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 516.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 152.0 was recorded at Year 2001
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 18 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2018.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2001 to 2009.
